long_description: Wrap a web of protection around your daypack or small backpack with this stainless-steel cable lock. A series of slash-proof, stainless-steel cables hug your pack, eliminating access to pockets and strapped-on items. Polycarbonate locking system with adjustable draw wire and padlock secures pack to fixed objects to deter theft. Use while wearing pack in areas known for pilfering, or when left unattended in hostels, trains or baggage check. Fits backpacks and travel packs ranging in size from 1,550 cu. in. to 3,400 cu. in. Stuffs into a compact, 5.5 x 4 x 2 in. nylon pouch for easy packing. Approximate volume of bags the PacSafe 55 Security Web will protect: 1,550 - 3,400 cu. in. Please note: Lock is not Travel Sentry(TM) approved; locks that are approved allow airport screeners access without damaging the lock.
short_description: Wrap a web of protection around your daypack or small backpack with this stainless-steel cable lock.
